creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
inscription:
lower left corner
in brown/black ink
medium: Opaque colors and ink on paper
portfolio: Folio from a Series Commissioned by Lady Impey
text: A bird perched on a branch. The bird’s body is brown and the top of its head has blue feathers. Its wings and tail have bands of blue and tan feathers.
title: Indian Roller on Sandalwood Branch
